DOC.brief_summary: This study single center , randomize pilot study evaluate clinical effectiveness nasal high flow 20LPM humidification therapy subject Cystic Fibrosis .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating High Flow Humidification Therapy Patients With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis CF Hospital admission acute pulmonary exacerbation CF ( use Fuchs criterion 4/10 ) 10 year age old Subject able comply procedure schedule protocol Signed informed consent form Receipt aerosolize experimental investigational drug within 1 month enrollment Subject ear , nose , throat ( ENT ) surgery , nasal bleeding , nasal polyp within 6 month prior study Subject unlikely comply procedure schedule protocol Inability give inform consent Subject require supplemental oxygen History obstructive sleep apnea History pressure headache require therapy within one month enrollment Any medical psychological condition study doctor ( ) believe ( ) would inhibit individual appropriate study subject .
DOC.keyword: Cystic Fibrosis , high flow 20 liter per minute ( LPM ) humidification therapy
